Upland.KSPA: KSPA is a commercial radio station located in Ontario, California, broadcasting to the Inland Empire area on 1510 AM. KSPA airs an Ethnic format. KSPA was the flagship station of the Rancho Cucamonga Quakes of the California League of Minor League Baseball from 2008 to 2013. It is also an affiliate of the San Diego Chargers and USC Trojans football.
